thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Seine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Boutique Hotel -
thread.title_full: Lovely Boutique Hotel - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kibrown
title: Lovely Boutique Hotel -
text:
Located two blocks from the Eiffel Tower, across the street from the Seine, and next to the metro station, you could not ask for a better location. Also, this hotel is small enough to allow for a truly personal experience. The Art Deco interior was lovely and we were charmed by the hallway ceiling outside our room which had small twinkle lights embedded that shone at night.
The elevator was antique, really only carrying one person (one AMERICAN- we tend to be more DENSE than Europeans)! But we had no problems with it.
Be sure to book directly with the hotel. They give 10% off the lowest online rate and breakfast (we booked through hotels.com and they offered to switch it and give us the benefits).
All pictures on the website are accurate as well.
